# Engineering [color=#f39f27]Engineering[/color] is a combination of [textlink="construction" link="ESConstruction"] work, [textlink="repair" link="ESExpandingRepairingStation"] work, maintaining a death machine that happens to produce [textlink="power" link="ESPower"], and making sure the station contains [textlink="breathable air" link="ESAtmospherics"].
## Personnel [color=#f39f27]Engineering[/color]'s staff is made up of Station Engineers and Atmospheric Technicians.
## Tools
Your core toolset is a small variety of tools. If you're an engineer, then you should have a belt on your waist containing one of each; if not, you can likely find them in maintenance shafts and in tool storage within assorted toolboxes and vending machines.
Most tasks will have explainers for how to perform them on examination; for example, if you're [textlink="constructing" link="ESConstruction"] a wall, it'll tell you the next step if you look at it a bit closer.
